issue.title: [R] Export and document list_compute_functions
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12200](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12200). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Since they're available to call in dplyr now, we should make it available. Note that not all compute functions are suitable to work in filter/mutate, and some will require custom C++ wiring for the FunctionOptions. But many/most just work now.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12200?focusedCommentId=17317442) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
Issue resolved by pull request 9916
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/9916>
